Reviews.Title: “A modern & lovely place with a high respect to their guests!”

Reviews.Content: stayed 4star hotels deira landmark grand hotel definitely traveled husband sister double extra bed comfortable bed clean spacious furnished bathroom lobby warm friendly atmosphere feel welcoming staff polite helpful satisfy thank landmark grand hotel restaurant modern sections hotel served variety delicious food breakfast lunch honest looking tasteful minor water warming system key wall push water warmed taking shower job cold ten minutes taking shower hope solved soon call 5star hotel enjoy stay hotel definitely
